biotools.summary:
Integrative analyses of single-cell transcriptome and regulome using MAESTRO.

MAESTRO(Model-based AnalysEs of Single-cell Transcriptome and RegulOme) is a comprehensive single-cell RNA-seq and ATAC-seq analysis suit built using snakemake.

Benchmark codes used in MAESTRO paper.

We provided the codes used in evaluating scATAC-seq clustering, automatic cell-type annotation, integration between scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq using different methods, and integration evaluation using different peak-RP model in this repository.
